# Support

Thank you for using our projects from the 5IA-Maserati organization!  
We aim to provide clear guidance and support for contributors, users, and collaborators.

---

## üõ† Getting Help

Before submitting an issue, please:

1. **Check the Documentation:**  
   üìö [Project Wiki](https://github.com/5IA-Maserati/.github/wiki)  
   Many common questions and instructions are already covered there.

2. **Search Existing Issues:**  
   üîç Make sure your question or problem hasn‚Äôt been already reported.

3. **Use Discussions (if enabled):**  
   üí¨ Engage with the community in a constructive way.

---

## üì¨ How to Request Support

If you still need help:

1. Open a **new issue** using the appropriate template:
   - Bug report
   - Feature request

2. Provide:
   - Clear description of the problem or question
   - Steps to reproduce (if applicable)
   - Screenshots, logs, or error messages
   - Environment details (OS, browser, version)

> Note: Issues meant only for general support questions may be redirected to Discussions or Documentation.

---

## ‚è± Response Time

We are a student organization, so response times may vary.  
We aim to reply within a few business days. Patience is appreciated!  

---

Thank you for helping us maintain a positive and collaborative environment!
